summary: Diff primarily updates/creates documentation scaffolding and adds a new URL-parameter/sessionStorage utility, but does not provide evidence of an actual IC production deployment or completed runbook/domain setup docs as required.

missing_requirements.requirement: Publish Draft Version 33 to live/production by executing the production deployment checklist (build + deploy backend and frontend to the IC network) and recording the results in a complete deployment log.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not include any captured deployment output/log with date/time, operator, commit hash, DFX version, or command output, nor any evidence of executed `dfx build/deploy ... --network ic` and verification results for ic0.app/custom domain.

missing_requirements.requirement: Expand the domain walkthrough so it fully covers retrieving the frontend canister ID, required DNS records with concrete examples, and high-level IC custom domain mapping steps, and ensure it does not end mid-step.
missing_requirements.reason: The updated guide appears to stop at 'Method 1: Using DFX CLI (Recommended)' and ends immediately after (truncated) without showing the required concrete DNS record examples and IC domain mapping steps; based on visible content, it still ends mid-step.

missing_requirements.requirement: Complete the production go-live runbook end-to-end after 'Environment Check', including environment validation steps, exact deploy commands, post-deploy verification for ic0.app and https://clearing.icp0.io, and required verification items/troubleshooting references.
missing_requirements.reason: The runbook content shown still stops at 'Environment Check' and begins a 'Verify DFX version' code block without including the missing end-to-end deploy commands, verifications (ic0.app and clearing.icp0.io), or troubleshooting pointer.

hallucinated_features.description: Added URL parameter parsing + sessionStorage persistence utilities (including hash-query parsing and clearing parameters from URL hash).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on production deployment/go-live documentation and domain setup walkthrough; it explicitly lists non-goals as new product features unrelated to publishing/go-live. These utilities are new application behavior not requested by REQ-1/2/3.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added a generated-looking summary file describing many UI/component changes across the frontend.
hallucinated_features.reason: The request did not ask for UI/feature changes or for generating a file that summarizes component behavior; it is unrelated to the deployment/runbook/domain documentation requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project state metadata to track request items (AR-1..AR-5).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of REQ-1/2/3 acceptance criteria and not requested deliverable; appears to be internal bookkeeping rather than deployment execution or documentation completion.
